books.name: Little Women
books.author: Louisa May Alcott
books.description: Love is the only thing we can take with us when we leave.

books.name: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A lady's imagination is very rapid.

books.name: Jane Eyre
books.author: Charlotte Brontë
books.description: I am a free human being with an independent will.

books.name: Emma
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will.

books.name: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaeldies
books.description: Only she knows what happened. Only he can make her talk.

books.name: Deadly Web
books.author: Mike Omer
books.description: Killers don’t patiently wait their turn before committing murder.

books.name: The Passengers
books.author: John Marrs
books.description: Eight self-drive cars set on a collision course. Who lives, who dies? You decide.

books.name: Verity
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: tTe things lurking around inside the mind can be just as dangerous as tangible threats.

books.name: The Maltese Falcon
books.author: Dashiell Hammett
books.description: The classic hardboiled detective story that introduces the iconic Sam Spade.

books.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.description: A gripping tale of mystery and intrigue centered around journalist Mikael Blomkvist and hacker Lisbeth Salander.

books.name: The Cuckoo's Calling
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first book in the Cormoran Strike series, featuring private investigator Cormoran Strike.

books.name: In the Woods
books.author: Tana French
books.description: A gripping psychological thriller involving a detective haunted by his past.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first book in the beloved Harry Potter series, chronicling the young wizard's adventures.

books.name: The Name of the Wind
books.author: Patrick Rothfuss
books.description: An epic fantasy following the story of Kvothe, a magically gifted young man.

books.name: Mistborn: The Final Empire
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The first book in the Cormoran Strike series, featuring private investigator Cormoran Strike.

books.name: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The prelude to the famous Lord of the Rings series, following the adventures of Bilbo Baggins.

books.name: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A science fiction masterpiece set in a distant future amidst political intrigue and interstellar conflicts.

books.name: Neuromancer
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: A groundbreaking novel that popularized the cyberpunk genre.

books.name: The Martian
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A gripping story of survival on Mars after an astronaut is stranded.

books.name: Foundation
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: The first book in the seminal Foundation series exploring the fall of a vast galactic empire.
